Data Serialization

Data Serialization¶

ms_deisotope can write mass spectra to file in either mzML, MGF, and mzMLb formats with builtin serializers for raw and deisotoped mass spectra, preserving as much metadata as these formats allow.

Topics

  • Writing mzML
  • Writing MGF
  • Writing mzMLb
